channel.title: Can someone tell me how to make a mod ring?
channel.description: like when you equip the ring you cant die... you know what i mean right

item.title: Can someone tell me how to make a mod ring?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == ####) {
sendMessage(“you equip the mod rings”);
playerLevel[#] == ##;
}

That is wrong, I forgot how to set your hp when equipping something, so look around in your client.java or Handlers or something for something that will set your hp level.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone tell me how to make a mod ring?

item.title: Can someone tell me how to make a mod ring?

Go to item.cfg, search ummm perfect ring if you like and edit its stats
